reviewText: Another Jack Reed special........especially enjoy Brian Dennehy and Charles Dutton........both are great actors.......even the 'bad' guys were terrific.  Very emotional picture.

Nice DVD to watch, and it really helps if you are a Brian Dennehy fan,  of which I definitely am.
I find all of  Brian Dennehy  movies to be good.
I love this Video and have played it back many times as it has great action and good story background and sceens.
I love all Brian Dennehy movies. I wish they had reruns. My favorite actor, Love Him!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Saw Him in Woodstock, ct.. Lost my voice

I saw these movies when they aired on network television.  I haven't seen them since, but have always remembered them favorably.  I found them on Amazon and decided to buy them.  I am not disappointed.  The only way they could be better is if they were in Blu-ray, but they weren't popular enough to go that route.  Brian Dennehy has always been one of my favorite actors and he does not disappoint.  He also produced these three movies.  Good storytelling.
I thought this movie had good suspense theme to it, also the cast was well chosen. I particularly enjoy Brian Dennehy movies.

I like all of the Jack Reed series dvds. I wish that more of these were available
Thanks,
Wayne Brown

It's a contrast of action and suspense and very fine acting on Brian Dennehy part. I brought the video and couldn't wait for the dvd and I have several of his movies going back a long time, I don't like saying to much about movies as everybody see them in a different aspect and I don't want to spoil there ideas of what a to expect and let them judge for themselves.

The politician running for Mayor should be a typical Politian and was portrayed rather well.  So then was the Sheriff Dept Lieutenant, Detective and Sergeant.  No sweeping things under the rug.  Amen to this type of program, portrayed after an actual event no less.  John Henry
A classic "cops and robbers" story with police/political corruption woven in.  Not unnecessarily violent or bloody.  "Kojack", but in Chicago, not NYC
Definitely worth watching.  Brian Dennehy makes a great everyman type hero.
Always loved the Jack Reed Stories, wish amazon had more of them.
Good clean movie , without filth or filthy language
Okay movie to watch on a rainy day, if you've got nothing else going on.  Could be better, could be worse

Brian Dennehy is an excellent actor and he is really wonderful in this dvd, highly recommended.  You can never
go wrong with anything he has acted in.
